analysis: The current project is a website about black holes with an incomplete dark, cosmic theme. The HTML structure includes slides, but the CSS and JavaScript files are not fully implemented to create an immersive black hole experience. The theme should focus on dark, cosmic visuals with animations for black hole effects, swirling patterns, and glowing elements to enhance the user experience.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Add styles for a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.

Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons and interactive elements.
